description: Strava is the social network for athletes. We’re a global community of millions of runners, cyclists and triathletes, united by the camaraderie of sport.

events.name: webhookEvent
events.description: This method is called every time a Strava webhook event occurs
steps: You can add a webhook using addWebhook block

args.name: token
args.info: Token sent on each message

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Get access token

args.name: clientId
args.info: Client id from Strava

args.name: clientSecret
args.info: Client secret from Strava

args.name: code
args.info: Code provided by user

blocks.name: revokeAccessToken
blocks.description: Revoke access token

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

blocks.name: listFriends
blocks.description: List athlete's friends

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: athleteId
args.info: Id of the Strava athlete

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: listFollowers
blocks.description: List athlete's followers

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: athleteId
args.info: Id of the Strava athlete

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: listBothFollowing
blocks.description: Retrieve the athletes who both the authenticated user and the indicated athlete are following.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: athleteId
args.info: Id of the Strava athlete

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: getCurrentAthlete
blocks.description: This request is used to retrieve information about the currently authenticated athlete.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

blocks.name: getAnotherAthlete
blocks.description: This request is used to retrieve information about any athlete on Strava.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: athleteId
args.info: Id of the Strava athlete

blocks.name: updateCurrentAthlete
blocks.description: Update current athlete's information on Strava.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: city
args.info: Athlete's city

args.name: state
args.info: Athlete's state

args.name: country
args.info: Athlete's country

args.name: sex
args.info: Athlete's sex

args.name: weight
args.info: Athlete's weight

blocks.name: getZones
blocks.description: Returns the heart rate and power zones of the requesting athlete.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

blocks.name: getTotalsAndStats
blocks.description: Returns recent (last 4 weeks), year to date and all time stats for a given athlete.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: athleteId
args.info: Id of the Strava athlete. Must match the authenticated athlete

blocks.name: getKomsAndQoms
blocks.description: Returns an array of segment efforts representing Overall KOMs/QOMs and course records held by the given athlete. Yearly KOMs are not included.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: athleteId
args.info: Id of the Strava athlete

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: listActivityComments
blocks.description: The number of comments is included in the activity summary and detail responses.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityId
args.info: Id of the Strava activity

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: listActivityKudos
blocks.description: A kudos is Strava’s version of a ‘Like’ or a ‘+1’. The number of kudos on an activity is returned with the activity summary.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityId
args.info: Id of the Strava activity

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: listActivityPhotos
blocks.description: The number of photos is included in the activity summary and detail responses. Use this endpoint to retrieve a list of photos associated with this activity. This endpoint can only be accessed by the owner of the activity.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityId
args.info: Id of the Strava activity

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: createActivity
blocks.description: Create new activity

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityName
args.info: Name of the Strava activity

args.name: activityType
args.info: Type of the Strava activity

args.name: startDate
args.info: Start date of the Strava activity

args.name: elapsedTime
args.info: Elapsed time in seconds of the Strava activity

args.name: description
args.info: Description of the Strava activity

args.name: distance
args.info: Distance of the Strava activity

args.name: private
args.info: Whether this is private activity

args.name: trainer
args.info: Whether this is trainer activity

blocks.name: getSingleActivity
blocks.description: Returns a detailed representation if the activity is owned by the requesting athlete.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityId
args.info: Id of the Strava activity

args.name: includeAllEfforts
args.info: Used to include all segment efforts in the Result

blocks.name: updateActivity
blocks.description: Update existing activity

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityId
args.info: Id of the Strava activity

args.name: activityName
args.info: Name of the Strava activity

args.name: activityType
args.info: Type of the Strava activity

args.name: description
args.info: Description of the Strava activity

args.name: gearId
args.info: Gear ID of the Strava activity

args.name: private
args.info: Whether this is private activity

args.name: trainer
args.info: Whether this is trainer activity

blocks.name: listMyActivities
blocks.description: This endpoint returns a list of activities for the authenticated user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: before
args.info: Result will start with activities whose startDate is before this value

args.name: after
args.info: Result will start with activities whose startDate is after this value

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: listRelatedActivities
blocks.description: Returns the activities that were matched as “with this group”.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityId
args.info: Id of the Strava activity

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: listFriendsActivities
blocks.description: List the recent activities performed by the current athlete and those they are following

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: before
args.info: Result will start with activities whose startDate is before this value. before and page can not be used in combination. They are independent ways of indicating where in the list of activities to begin the results.

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return. before and page can not be used in combination. They are independent ways of indicating where in the list of activities to begin the results.

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: listActivityZones
blocks.description: Heartrate and power zones are set by the athlete. This endpoint returns the time (seconds) in each zone.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityId
args.info: Id of the Strava activity

blocks.name: listActivityLaps
blocks.description: This resource will return all laps for an activity. Laps are triggered by athletes using their respective devices, such as Garmin watches.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityId
args.info: Id of the Strava activity

blocks.name: getGroupEvent
blocks.description: Retrieve group event

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: groupEventId
args.info: Id of the Strava group event

blocks.name: listClubGroupEvents
blocks.description: Returns an array of club group event summary representations ordered by occurrence time.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: clubId
args.info: Id of the Strava club

args.name: upcoming
args.info: Only include future events if true

blocks.name: joinGroupEvent
blocks.description: Join group event

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: groupEventId
args.info: Id of the Strava group event

blocks.name: leaveGroupEvent
blocks.description: Leave group event

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: groupEventId
args.info: Id of the Strava group event

blocks.name: deleteGroupEvent
blocks.description: Delete group event

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: groupEventId
args.info: Id of the Strava group event

blocks.name: listJoinedAthletes
blocks.description: Retrieve summary information about athletes joined a specific group event, or the upcoming occurrence for recurring events.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: groupEventId
args.info: Id of the Strava group event

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: getSingleClub
blocks.description: Retrieve details about a specific club.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: clubId
args.info: Id of the Strava club

blocks.name: listMyClubs
blocks.description: Fetch an array of clubs that the currently authenticated athlete is a member of.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

blocks.name: listClubMembers
blocks.description: Retrieve summary information about members of a specific club.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: clubId
args.info: Id of the Strava club

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: listClubAdmins
blocks.description: Retrieve summary information about admins of a specific club.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: clubId
args.info: Id of the Strava club

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: listClubActivities
blocks.description: Retrieve summary information about activities of a specific club.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: clubId
args.info: Id of the Strava club

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

args.name: before
args.info: Result will start with activities whose startDate is before this value

blocks.name: joinClub
blocks.description: Join a club on behalf of the authenticated athlete. If the club is private the join will need to be approved by a club admin unless the authenticated athlete had previously been invited to the club.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: clubId
args.info: Id of the Strava club

blocks.name: leaveClub
blocks.description: Leave a club on behalf of the authenticated user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: clubId
args.info: Id of the Strava club

blocks.name: getSingleGear
blocks.description: Retrieve details about a specific item of gear. The requesting athlete must own the gear. At this time it is not possible to view just anyone’s gear type and usage.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: gearId
args.info: Id of the Strava gear

blocks.name: getSingleRoute
blocks.description: Retrieve details about a specific item of gear. The requesting athlete must own the gear. At this time it is not possible to view just anyone’s gear type and usage.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: routeId
args.info: Id of the Strava route

blocks.name: listRoutes
blocks.description: Lists a specific athlete’s routes. Private routes will only be included if the authenticating user is viewing their own routes and the token has view_private permissions.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: athleteId
args.info: Id of the Strava athlete

args.name: after
args.info: Result will start with activities whose startDate is after this value

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

args.name: type
args.info: Route type

blocks.name: listRaces
blocks.description: This request is used to retrieve a list of races occurring in a year, ordered by occurrence date from oldest to most recent.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: year
args.info: Defaults to the current year

blocks.name: getSingleRace
blocks.description: This request is used to retrieve details about a running race.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: raceId
args.info: Id of the Strava race

blocks.name: getSingleSegment
blocks.description: This request is used to retrieve details about a single segment

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: segmentId
args.info: Id of the Strava segment

blocks.name: listStarredSegments
blocks.description: Returns a summary representation of the segments starred by the authenticated user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: starSingleSegment
blocks.description: This request is used to star single segment

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: segmentId
args.info: Id of the Strava segment

blocks.name: unstarSingleSegment
blocks.description: This request is used to unstar single segment

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: segmentId
args.info: Id of the Strava segment

blocks.name: listSegmentEfforts
blocks.description: Retrieve an array of segment efforts, for a given segment, filtered by athlete and/or a date range.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: segmentId
args.info: Id of the Strava segment

args.name: athleteId
args.info: Id of the Strava athlete

args.name: startDate
args.info: Date range filtering is accomplished using an inclusive start and end time, thus startDate and endDate must be sent together.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Date range filtering is accomplished using an inclusive start and end time, thus startDate and endDate must be sent together.

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: getSegmentLeaderboards
blocks.description: Leaderboards represent the ranking of athletes on specific segments.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: segmentId
args.info: Id of the Strava segment

args.name: ageGroup
args.info: Age group of athletes

args.name: weightClass
args.info: Weight class of athletes in kg

args.name: following
args.info: Include athletes which are followed

args.name: clubId
args.info: Id of the Strava club

args.name: dateRange
args.info: Date range of results

args.name: contextEntries
args.info: Default is 2, max of 15

args.name: page
args.info: Number of the page to return

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items per page to return

blocks.name: getSegmentsByCoordinates
blocks.description: This endpoint can be used to find popular segments within a given area.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: swCoordinates
args.info: South west corner coordinates of the area

args.name: neCoordinates
args.info: North east corner coordinates of the area

args.name: activityType
args.info: Type of activity. Default is riding

args.name: minCategory
args.info: Minimum climb category filter

args.name: maxCategory
args.info: Maximum climb category filter

blocks.name: getSegmentSingleEffort
blocks.description: Retrieve details about a specific segment effort. The effort must be public or it must correspond to the current athlete.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: effortId
args.info: Id of the segment effort

blocks.name: getActivityStreams
blocks.description: Retrieve details about a specific segment effort. The effort must be public or it must correspond to the current athlete.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityId
args.info: Id of the Strava activity

args.name: types
args.info: :List of types, if the activity does not have that stream it will not be included in the response

args.name: resolution
args.info: Default is all, indicates desired number of data points, streams will only be down sampled

args.name: seriesType
args.info: Relevant only if using resolution, used to index the streams if the stream is being reduced

blocks.name: getEffortStreams
blocks.description: A segment effort represents an attempt on a segment. This resource returns a subset of the activity streams that correspond to that effort.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: effortId
args.info: Id of the Strava effort

args.name: types
args.info: :List of types, if the activity does not have that stream it will not be included in the response

args.name: resolution
args.info: Default is all, indicates desired number of data points, streams will only be down sampled

args.name: seriesType
args.info: Relevant only if using resolution, used to index the streams if the stream is being reduced

blocks.name: getSegmentStreams
blocks.description: This resource returns a subset of the activity streams that correspond to segment. Only distance, altitude and latlng stream types are available.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: segmentId
args.info: Id of the Strava segment

args.name: types
args.info: :List of types, if the activity does not have that stream it will not be included in the response

args.name: resolution
args.info: Default is all, indicates desired number of data points, streams will only be down sampled

args.name: seriesType
args.info: Relevant only if using resolution, used to index the streams if the stream is being reduced

blocks.name: getRouteStreams
blocks.description: This resource returns a subset of the activity streams that correspond to route. Distance, altitude and latlng stream types are always returned.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: routeId
args.info: Id of the Strava route

blocks.name: uploadActivity
blocks.description: Posting a file for upload will enqueue it for processing. Initial checks will be done for malformed data and duplicates.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: activityFile
args.info: The actual activity data, if gzipped the data_type must end with .gz

args.name: dataType
args.info: Data type of the file

args.name: activityType
args.info: Type of the Strava activity

args.name: name
args.info: Activity name. If not provided, will be populated using start date and location, if available

args.name: description
args.info: Activity description.

args.name: private
args.info: Whether this is private activity

args.name: trainer
args.info: Whether this is trainer activity. activities without lat/lng info in the file are auto marked as stationary, set to true to force

args.name: externalId
args.info: Data filename will be used by default but should be a unique identifie

blocks.name: checkUploadStatus
blocks.description: Upon upload, Strava will respond with an upload ID. You may use this ID to poll the status of your upload.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token provided received from Strava

args.name: uploadId
args.info: Id of the upload

blocks.name: addWebhook
blocks.description: Add new webhook

args.name: clientId
args.info: Client id from Strava

args.name: clientSecret
args.info: Client secret from Strava

args.name: objectType
args.info: Must match one of the supported object types. E.g. : activity

args.name: aspectType
args.info: Must match one of the supported aspect types. E.g.: create

args.name: webhookUrl
args.info: You can use our service as webhookUrl. https://webhooks.rapidapi.io/api/message/Strava/webhookEvent/{projectName}/{projectKey}. See details above

args.name: verifyToken
args.info: User state specified by the user

blocks.name: listWebhooks
blocks.description: This request is used to retrieve the summary representations of the push subscriptions in place for the current application.

args.name: clientId
args.info: Client id from Strava

args.name: clientSecret
args.info: Client secret from Strava

blocks.name: deleteWebhook
blocks.description: Delete existing webhook

args.name: clientId
args.info: Client id from Strava

args.name: clientSecret
args.info: Client secret from Strava

args.name: webhookId
args.info: Id of the webhook
